CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 30, 1954, pg. 6 reads: "'Miss America' Appeals - Lee Ann Meriweather [Meriwether], 'Miss America, (it's obvious, ain't it?) is shown directing an appeal to Pittsburgh area residents to aid the Community Chest drive. Bill Powell, radio station WILY disc jockey, had the pleasure of interviewing the young lady. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: WILY radio announcer Rev. Bill Powell interviewing Miss America 1955, Lee Ann Meriwether, at May Stern's department store, another version
